title: Sunspots - 75 Percent
description: This is a variation of the Sunspotsdataset. In this variation, 75% of the latest epochs from the original timeseries are retained. MONTHLY

idField.name: Series
idField.description: Unique identifier marking the single series in this dataset

forecastTarget.name: Sunspots
forecastTarget.description: Number of sunspots. Sunspots are temporary phenomena on the Sun's photosphere that appear as spots darker than the surrounding areas.
